summary: Adds nine new swords and great swords each based off one of the nine holds.
descriptionHtml:
Blades Of The Thanes
--------------------------
Adds nine new swords and great swords each based off one of the nine holds.
Falkreath - Great Sword
Windhelm - Great Sword
Dawnstar - Great Sword
Markath -  Great Sword
Morthal - Great Sword
Solitude - Sword
Whiterun- Sword
Riften- Sword
Winterhold- Sword
------------------------
The swords can be found in the Longhall , guard house or palace of there respective hold
(see pictures for precise location)
------------------------------------------
The swords have stats slightly higher than steel with a higher speed, critical chance and stagger, coming from a slightly higher quality of steel.
It is rumored that if upgraded with a dragon bone these weapons become more potent.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If anyone can alter this or pm me instructions on how to acquire these when you become a thane it would be much obliged.
----------------------------------------
Installation
--------------
Copy files to the skyrim data folder
-------------------------------------------
SDD707
author: SDD707
